pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Medicinal Oil Headache Ease Oil 25ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Headache Ease with Lemon, Peppermint & Lavender essential oils that have been traditionally used in aromatherapy to help relieve tension and headaches.

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional.
Application to skin may cause sensitivity to sunlight.
Keep out of reach of children.
Not to be taken.
Not to be used neat.
Store below 30C.
Do not use if seal is around lid is damaged.

Common Uses

The soothing effects of Lemon, Peppermint and Lavender essential oils have been traditionally used in aromatherapy for the temporary relief of headaches and mild migraines such as a throbbing head, sinusitis, nausea, nervous tension and sleeplessness.

Ingredients

Each mL of PURE ESSENTIAL OIL contains essential oils from:
Citrus limon (Lemon) Fruit peel 620 µL, Mentha X piperita
(Peppermint) Leaves 300 µL, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender)
Herb top flowering 80 µL.

Directions

How to Use (Adults and children 2 years and over, use as required or up to 6 times a day):
Vaporisation: Add 3-6 drops (0.2mL) to the water in your vaporiser.
Massage: Add 5 drops (0.2mL) to 10mL carrier oil and massage onto temples and back of neck. The mixture can be kept for 24 hours at room temperature.
